# Changelog

## [0.1.1] - 2026-01-19

### Changed

- Switch from mcp[cli] to fastmcp for better CLI support
- Fix --help and --version flags
- Fix Pydantic deprecation warning

## [0.1.0] - 2026-01-19

### Added

- Initial release
- MCP server for OpenTelemetry trace analysis
- X-Ray integration for AWS trace retrieval
- Trace parsing and analysis tools
- Performance and error analyzers
